title: Thunderbird - multiple email accounts
content: I have quite a few email accounts coming into Thunderbird. I'm about to add another but want it to be the third account down, instead of 8th. How do I move whole accounts up or down the list?
creator: organicsheri

title: Is it possible to delete multiple selected messages from Inbox with a single click?
content:
When I select multiple Inbox messages and right-click, there is no choice shown to delete all of them. Please see the uploaded images.

Thanks for your help, SweetTasha
creator: sweettasha

title: I CANNOT READ ANY OF THE TEXT ON NEW UPDATE, IT IS STUCK ON SIZE 5, WHOLE THING!   CAN I PLEASE UNDO BACK TO WHAT I HAD THAT DID WORK?
content: bold text ON SETTINGS, THE FONT IS STUCK ON 5 FOR THE WHOLE PROGRAM AND IS IMPOSSIBLE TO READ! I JUST NEED SIMPLE STUFF, NOT OVER COMPLICATED STUFF. IT WAS WORKING, CAN I PLEASE UNDO THE UPDATE? PLEASE!!!!!
creator: pamclark1
